title: Support Hospice
description: Brook Lane provides a continuum of mental health services for people throughout the Mid-Atlantic region.
cleaned_text: Join us in this month-long event to raise funds for Doey's House, a home-like and supportive setting for hospice patients and their families. Brook Lane is opening a new outpatient clinic, set to open in the western panhandle of Maryland early fall of 2023. Brook Lane's main campus is located in Hagerstown, Maryland. There are two satellite locations in Hagerstown and Frederick, Maryland. [Brook Lane Secures Spot on Most Beautiful Hospital List](/blog/brook-lane-secures-spot-most-beautiful-hospital-list) August 4, 2023 August 3, 2023
